ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Read, construct and write CDISC (Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium) Dataset JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) files, while validating per the Dataset JSON schema file, as described in CDISC (2023) <https://www.cdisc.org/standards/data-exchange/dataset-json>.

Read, construct and write CDISC (Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium) Dataset JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) files, while validating per the Dataset JSON schema file, as described in CDISC (2023) <https://www.cdisc.org/standards/data-exchange/dataset-json>.

name: r-datasetjson
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-datasetjson
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/datasetjson_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/datasetjson/datasetjson_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7bffc41fe410cbe39cd597f5bac95ed4efea104c7f6bcb74fbeed5f7d992c1bc

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-hms
    - r-jsonvalidate >=1.3.1
    - r-yyjsonr >=0.1.18
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-hms
    - r-jsonvalidate >=1.3.1
    - r-yyjsonr >=0.1.18

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('datasetjson')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('datasetjson')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://atorus-research.github.io/datasetjson/
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Read, construct and write CDISC (Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium) Dataset
    JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) files, while validating per the Dataset JSON schema
    file, as described in CDISC (2023) <https://www.cdisc.org/standards/data-exchange/dataset-json>.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file:
    - LICENSE-2.0.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
